website_summaries.verdict: This is the gold-standard of Yetis to keep your drink of choice hot or cold all day long in this 30 oz. cup.
pros: Has an extended capacity of 30 oz., allowing you to quench your thirst all day long
Lid opening can accommodate a straw, if desired
Design of cup and lid are both easy to clean
cons: Larger size makes it a bit hard to grip, although add-on handles are available for purchase

customer_reviews.title: I like the new lid but I knew it couldn’t stop ...
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this cup!! I’ve had it for 2 days and and I filled it full of ice and tea and it melted after only a couple of hours! The first yeti I bought didn’t do this. I think the reviewers are right .. it’s a fake! Color was spot on and it had no flaws other than not keeping my drink cold. I like the new lid but I knew it couldn’t stop spills. Returning! You can buy from the actual YETI Website for the same price..Plus i got it customized and shipped for free!! 34.99 plus tax..Can’t beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I truly loved this mug, because it is so sturdy and the black & silver looked so beautiful, the magnetic lid was not leak proof and I was willing to deal with that but when it started rusting, well, that was the last straw which is such ashame. I have another yeti product that I use multiple times daily and it's fantastic. By the way I ordered this 30 oz rambler on Nov. 4th. Rusting with less than 30 day usage, I wonder if this is an authentic item.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good tumbler but lid leaks
customer_reviews.text: Nice tumbler, keeps hot stuff hot and cold stuff cold for a LONG time ***BUT*** the lid leaks in the closed position. That, for an outdoors/TRAVEL tumbler is a fatal flaw. It would NOT have cost a lot per unit to make the closeable piece of the lid SEAL properly. The seal around the brim of the cup is fine. The leak is through the moveable closing piece. I am pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tiemens

customer_reviews.title: Scratched and stained
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cup due to the high quality experience I’ve had with other yeti products. This cup arrived with what I thought was covered in filth but upon touching the product with my finger it is not dirt but rather stained and the stainless steel on the bottom is scratched. For the price I paid, this is a disgrace. I’m highly disappointed and DO NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Grace

customer_reviews.title: Plus the color is more like a Mint
customer_reviews.text: I GOT A FAKE!!! If my Yeti cup hadn't broke I would still be sporting the fake because i blindly trusted I was getting a quality product. I thought it was different but didn't compare the pictures until NOW! They are completely different. Mine is all one color no silver anywhere, not even the Yeti logo. My cap was completely different and doesn't even say YETI. Plus the color is more like a Mint, not what I expected. Make sure your cups are coming from YETI! I even bought an Amazon Choice one with 5 Star reviews so be cautious
customer_reviews.author: Mazvita

customer_reviews.title: Discoloring on powder coated finish
customer_reviews.text: Powder coat gets faded and discolored. Perhaps ye one I received is defective, but this price demands highest quality than this.
customer_reviews.author: BigWillyStyle

customer_reviews.title: Came with marks that could not be removed
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this yeti. However, arrived with multiple, VERY visible scuff marks that could not be removed. I have the same yeti in a sea foam green with no marks! I reordered and hope it arrives intact and does not come with any marks.
customer_reviews.author: Ml

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed customer
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a Christmas gift. When I received it I didn’t open it just wrapped it because I knew what it was. When my daughter opened it it has a dent in the cup and the top is missisng the piece that opens and closes it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele OConnell

customer_reviews.title: Got a fake one.
customer_reviews.text: My supposed Yeti mug is definitely fake. The Yeti website said the serial number does not exist. Also I noticed the outside of the mug gets ice cold when there’s an ice cold beverage inside. Even my old RTIC doesn’t do that. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Jams

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT A REAL YETI!!!
customer_reviews.text: WHAT A WASTE OF MONEY...IT MAY HAVE THE NAME BUT THIS IS DEFINITELY A KNOCK OFF..MY REAL YETI KEEPS ICE FOR AT LEAST 24HRS...THIS DIDN'T EVEN LAST 90 MINUTES, AND THAT WAS IN AIR CONDITIONING..SAVE YOUR MONEY & BUY FROM YETI.COM SHAME ON YOU & AMAZON!!!
customer_reviews.author: K9 Lover

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my Yeti cup on May 30th. I have now owned it for a few days over 2 months. At first it was great and I loved it. I am 2 months into using the cup and it now leaks at the rim every time I take a sip. I have no idea why. The seal is not broken and there are no cracks on the lid or the cup. I am very disappointed. I paid $40 for one cup and it is only good for 60 days???? This is absurd. NOT HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Taci Mathers

customer_reviews.title: Not a real Yeti
customer_reviews.text: Product did arrive as described. Packaging was different than what is sold in the stores and it did not have a registration card. Had to return as I could not register with Yeti.
customer_reviews.author: Dlok

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water ice cold even after 8 hours in a hot truck!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold water all day. I'm a computer consultant so I'm in an out of my truck all day long and I live in Phoenix and this stays in the cupholder. During the summer the temperature in the truck can easily top 140 but I still have ice in this at the end of the day! This holds plenty of water and keeps it ice cold even in the most brutal of conditions. It fits easily in my cupholder and is easy to refill. I couldn't be more happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Todd W.

customer_reviews.title: Can't even use this item
customer_reviews.text: This item did NOT come with a MagSlider lid. This is the lid it came with. How can anything stay hot or cold like this? How do you keep it from spilling? I spend $45 on Yeti products and have to return all of it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Broken.
customer_reviews.text: This had so many good reviews, I was hopeful but when I received my cup the black tab on the lid was broken. It won’t close and seal the cup. Such a bummer as this was not cheap. I tried to contact the seller, but got a message back stating they have left the amazon platform and were not able to get my message.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good at keeping things cold. I put ice in it before bed (no liquid) and the next morning it was still solid - very little melting. The reason for only 3 starts is - it dribbles - I cannot get a drink out of this thing without it dribbling on my shirt. I don't know if it is a design flaw or if I just got one with a faulty gasket.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Snetsinger

customer_reviews.title: Good, BUT leaks
customer_reviews.text: Mine was an authentic YETI, ordered the navy blue and it came with the YETI stickers and had the correct silver on top/bottom and the new magnetic slider lid. The cup is great, however soon after starting to use it the lid has started leaking through the seal when you drink out of it, so it drips all over the place. If I use it with a straw though it's fine, it only leaks under the lid when I actually lift it to my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Blomsterbarnen

customer_reviews.title: The package was fine so I know they shipped me a defective item
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with a dent on the bottom and wobbles when placed on a flat surface. The package was fine so I know they shipped me a defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good but not 3x better than Rtic
customer_reviews.text: Now that I finally pulled the trigger on the far more expensive Yeri, I don’t see any significant difference between it at the less expensive Rtic. Ok, the lid is nicer. But it doesn’t keep ice any longer, doesn’t make my hair any thicker, doesn’t give my truck better gas mileage. It’s good at what it does but not worth 3 x the price unless you’re brand conscious which I’m not.
customer_reviews.author: J. Price

customer_reviews.title: Love my Yeti
customer_reviews.text: Love my Yeti, and the color! It keeps my coffee hot all day, and my cold drinks super cold. I honestly had a hard time believing all the hype about these things, but I’m officially sold. They are worth every penny. There are several size options, but I love my big guy that can hold allllll my coffee. I hand wash it, and it cleans quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: We have had our 30 oz Yeti since May and it looks like it is rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Hasley

customer_reviews.title: Fake Yeti
customer_reviews.text: I guess this must be a knock off Yeti. It came with the bumper sticker and insert but my ice melted within hours. I have a $7 tumbler from Walmart that keeps my drink cold linger. Really bummed to have to send back
customer_reviews.author: Jody Short

customer_reviews.title: 30oz is perfect size for the on the go professional, worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the real deal! I was skeptical after viewing so many bad reviews an experiences but my order was fast to arrive and above an beyond my wildest dreams. Will definitely be purchasing 2 more for me an a gift to a friend. This thing is beautiful but a tank, I'm usually rough on items due to my 9-5 an a few weeks tell the truth. I recommend anyone who is apprehensive take a chance bc I guarantee you'll be writing a review much like the one your currently reading! 👍👏👌
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Authentic.Bought this for the husband and he loved it. He registered the product and it went through just fine. This is the second Yeti tumbler he has owned and they last a very long time. The lid is magnetic which makes it super easy to clean. There are other colors available. Just buy it!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: LiLop

customer_reviews.title: "Clay" Color Not Accurate in Product Photo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the YETI Rambler Tumbler 30 Ounce in the "clay" color for my husband. This tumbler is very well made. The magnetic lid makes it much easier to clean than all the other brands. Yes, it's a little expensive for a to-go cup, but it is a quality product. I purchased the "clay" color. The product photo looks like a gorgeous orangish brown color - kind of like clay. I was disappointed to receive the product and find that the color is more like a pumpkin orange. My husband color calibrates his computer screen, so that is not to blame. The product photo for the "clay" color is not accurate. I am returning for a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rosamond

customer_reviews.title: can't give this one or any of your lids good reviews.
customer_reviews.text: lids leak. Yeti sent me a new on and yep, it leaks too. need a new engineer in the design dept. :( bugs me because I really wanted the new one to work. sorry, can't give this one or any of your lids good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It's a real Yeti!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews, many felt they received fake Yeti merchandise. So I was a little concerned, but one of the reviewers said make sure it's from "Yeti Authorized" on Amazon. So I did that, and they are right, "Yeti Authorized" is the real deal. I also liked that it is a Prime product, so if something is wrong, you can easily exchange. I purchased a navy blue 30 oz Yeti tumbler and it's original Yeti. My advise is make sure it's from "Yeti Authorized" on amazon and that it's Prime. Be smart, if it's 50-70% off... probably a fake.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Not leakproof...and changes the taste of drink ...yuck
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the taste of the lemonade in this container and I was disappointed it leaked in my bag...it boasts leakproof
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Well THIS “new feeling” didn’t last long... (2/5)
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised after only using this once at a neighbors house Saturday evening after only getting it on Thursday, that it falls and is now scratched to bits after the neighbor’s dog knocked the cup from a low table onto their wooden deck. I would expect it to maybe ding the cup... not THIS (pictured). I’m extremely dissatisfied after investing what some would consider a hefty amount of money into a quality Yeti product, only to get the paint scratched off by the likes of an angry ex with a long history with split personality disorder. This just shocked me. Word of advice: if you DO plan to spend $35+ on this cup, get the S/S non-colored “OG” version!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: bad move YETI
customer_reviews.text: I got this before YETI was boycotting the NRA...bad move YETI...won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Beach Girl

customer_reviews.title: Hands off my Yeti!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with my Yeti’s!! I have a 20oz and loved it so much i bought the 30oz in the same color. Someone at work stole my 20oz and a month later they brought it to work (forgetting they STOLE IT) so i stole it back lol. I put my logo on it so if they did it again they’d have to put more effort into covering their tracks! I want a lavender color so if i ever see those, I’ll buy two more. Love this cup, never thought I’d be so excited about a tumbler...
customer_reviews.author: Cherries27

customer_reviews.title: GUESS WHAT? It works.
customer_reviews.text: Maintains ice cubes for hours. Love it. Best thing about it is that it fits in cup holders. The only thing missing is I wish it had a handle. Why doesn’t it have a handle? It is so slippery. Other than that I love it. I drop things. It’s what I do. I’m clumsy. But YETI cups are super durable so they are kid-proof and clumsy adult-proof. Worth every penny. Also the color is really rad. Looks exactly like the picture. If color is your thing— these cups are also awesome because they maintain vibrance overtime.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Never had a thermos I thought was worth the effort.
customer_reviews.text: This one was different.i decided to give it a shot because I drink a lot of water on the golf course, and really don’t like using single use bottles. This keeps ice water cold for hours. My wife finds the 30 ounce cup a bit big for her hands, so for small handed people, like trump, a smaller version might be more appropriate. This had the paperwork and registration number. I did not get stuck with a knockoff. The bottom is tapered so will fit nicely in cup holders in the car or golf cart.
customer_reviews.author: swampknot

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated ...Need a handle!🥤🥤🥤
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival I did a test. My house was 72 degrees, it was 5 PM...I placed a full tray of ice cube 🧊 into my Yeti. I covered with the lid.. I checked the next morning at 10 AM.... Though the cubes were slightly melted....It was pretty much full of the ice cube tray. The 30 oz is very large & heavy ...You MUST have a handle to hold it or be a basketball 🏀 player that can palm a basketball 🏀. It too large for the average person unless they 🍷 drink lots of sodas 🥤 or ice 🍵 tea or ☕️ coffee. Then this perfect BUT a handle that fits properly is ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY!😎😎😎😃
customer_reviews.author: rholland63

customer_reviews.title: where have u been all my life
customer_reviews.text: Living in Florida I honestly never leave home without my Yeti cup. This is a must have if you live in Florida. Keeps my drinks cold all day all night. I fill it up with ice in the morning and take it to work with me every day and still have ice in it on my ride home even though I refill it a couple times. I love waking up in the middle of the night when my mouth is dry and take a drink of super cold ice water. love my yeti & totally worth the price
customer_reviews.author: beach_girl

customer_reviews.title: I love yeti.
customer_reviews.text: I only wish I could get this in olive drab again. Kept my liquor drink icey cold while floating down the Guadeloupe in 90+ temps. If you want cold adult bevvies to stay cold, these are a must. Why bother with 20ounces when you can be cool and have 32 ounces. This is the ultimate yeti cup sure to make everyone in your office jealous. Most have the tiny cups for coffee or whatever. They know you mean business when you roll up to the meeting with this. They also know you spent more to be able to stunt with this cup. Buy the straw lid-branded of course- and be the coolest everywhere you go.
customer_reviews.author: MyDogIsMyLife

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is an authorized seller or authentic YETI products. Registration number comes with this product. It keeps my beverages cold 24+ hours. It is large to hold if you have small hands so i would recommend buying a compatible handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your drink cold or hot for the entire day!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great design and it keeps your drink either cold or hot all day. I forgot about my drink one evening and went to bed without finishing it. When I woke up the next morning, there was still ice in the cup and it was just as great tasting the next morning. I just love this cup and highly recommend it to anyone with a need for their drink to stay hot or cold for longer than a normal cup would provide. I would easily purchase this cup again! One more thing, I just love the limited edition color choice! Thanks for such a great product in my favorite color!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: We got two of these to prevent spills from our cat who knocks over every glass of water in the house. We use them every day. It keeps ice frozen for hours and hours! I love that the top is a magnet. It makes for easy cleaning. I will say though that the black one keeps ice frozen for almost twice as long as the mint green one (same style). I have a feeling it is a defect with the individual cups because we tried switching around the lids and nothing changed. Very strange. Still does a great job with hot and cold liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Cailan S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister as I had one and really love it. She needed a good size e cup that would keep her ice all night due to dry mouth from cancer. She loved that she didn’t have to go and get more ice overnight! We love our Yetis.
customer_reviews.author: snappsgirl89

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this cup
customer_reviews.text: This cup will keep ice water cold for more than a day. I have accidentally left my cup on my bedside table and a full 24 hrs later there is still ice in cup. I purchased the cup holder to go with this to make it more mug like and I am glad I did. Makes it much easier to grasp when cup is full. I don't have very big hands. Love the color...I purchased pink. So far very pleased with use, clean up...etc
customer_reviews.author: L Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Lid drips from magock
customer_reviews.text: I paid more for the mag lock lid... It drips very fast if laud on it's side. Is this is a real maglock...it sucks..
customer_reviews.author: sheldon behnke

customer_reviews.title: Authentic from Yeti Authorized
customer_reviews.text: I received my 30 oz Yeti Rambler, I have been in love ever since. I purchased mine from Yeti Authorized, and I received an authentic product. I was able to register my rambler on the official Yeti website. The Harbor Pink color is a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Romancer

customer_reviews.title: Lid is terrible and magnet falls right off
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had looked into these "mag lids" more before purchasing this expensive tumbler. I could have gotten the same quality tumbler from other manufacturers. The first thing that happened after adding the freshly brewed coffee is the tumbler tipped over and the lid came off, the magnet went flying and coffee everywhere. Not good for driving or anything other than sitting somewhere to sip water out of. I do not recommend for hot beverages as the heat just goes right out of the lid as it is not insulated. Kept my ice water cold all day though. Best feature is it is easy to clean compared to the Thermos brand coffee cup I tried to replace.
customer_reviews.author: janp

customer_reviews.title: Just Doesn't Work Well...
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality Yeti delivers, yet for me, this tumbler is just too big and I find drinking coffee out of it--difficult. This is my second Yeto purchase, and I've been using their mug in my car...but it doesn't fit in the cupholder--so I went this route. It's so big I feel like I'm always going to get a lap full, or shirt full of coffee when I'm driving and trying to drink my coffee. I would not buy this item again...
customer_reviews.author: MBF

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a "bandwagon" person so I refused to even think about buying one of these just because everyone was talking about them (or maybe because everyone was talking about them). Then, hubby's work gave him one. That was it. When his cup still had ice in it the next morning, I wanted one. In addition to that, I also love how easy they are to clean (since I am the dishwasher). The fact that I can easily remove the rubber gasket AND just pry up the MagSlider to properly clean is amazing! If I could think of a reason we needed more of these, I would buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Nolen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold, doesn’t keep ice frozen
customer_reviews.text: I really like this yeti cup. The slider top keeps it from leaking. It keeps drinks very cold, even overnight a drink stays cool. I’ve heard that yetis can even keep ice in it for a whole day. But in this yeti, my ice melts after a few hours. This makes me wonder if this is authentic yeti, or perhaps if the quality has gone down. Either way it’s a nice cup and keeps liquids cold-cool, so I’m content with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbler that keeps drinks cold for hours!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new YETI tumbler! I was able to keep ice in it from 7:00am until 2:00pm (in an air conditioned office setting) before it started to melt! I was very impressed that it stayed cold that long! However I did get the larger size 30oz tumbler and find it pretty heavy to hold especially filled with ice. If I order again I will probably get the smaller size for running errands or taking to sporting events but the 30oz definitely works for daily use while sitting at my desk in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: Well insulated
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my office, usually transfer from my gallon YETI to this, keeps my water cold for a good long while, longer than I need it to be. I'm a big fan of the magnetic slider, though if this tumbler is full and you take it in the car, you're like to expect a bit of spillage from the slider as it doesn't seem to fully seal there; if it's maybe half full I haven't had issues. Between this and my gallon, I probably should have split the difference and got a 64oz with chug cap. I'll probably get that too, just enjoying both of them a lot and this thing fits in my car cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: DevHead

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: If you like your hot beverages hot and your cold ones cold,this Yeti is perfect! The slider lid is great at preventing spills and keeping that temperature steady for that extra amount of time,as well as making it ideal for sipping your favorite beverage. I like my hot tea and the Yeti keeps it hot for hours!Not exactly sure how many hours because I always finish it before it can begin to cool down! It’s the same with cool drinks as well.I pop in a few ice cubes and I’m good for hours! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Darren Boyd Walters

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product. I had to buy a different lid because the one that comes with it leaks. I also found that hot liquids dont stay hot for very long if you dont put boiling hot liquids in it to start. For example hot chocolate, I have to boil the water on a stove to get it to last 5 hours. Just heating the water in microwave for a couple minutes only lasted me about 2 hours before it got cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sytkowski

customer_reviews.title: Love this cup
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup for my morning coffee. The magnetic lid makes it so much easier to clean. For those that said it's not completely leak proof, I will said it basically is but what you need to understand is that if you can't have a 100% air tight seal on a lid like this or the hot beverage will burst it off. So yes, if you tip it over a tiny bit will leak out but it will most certainly buy you time to pick it back up. It's just a matter of practicality. If you want something air tight, you'll have to purchase a thermos but otherwise this is the best you can get in a mug.
customer_reviews.author: Buffysk8s

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my new Yeti
customer_reviews.text: My first Yeti was a gift at least 4 years ago. I thought it was an odd gift I won't lie, just didn't think I needed or would use one. I could not have been more wrong. I legit go nowhere without it, my biggest problem is washing it because it's always full and I'm using it. Due to my personal neglect it rusted under a handle I purchased for it. I LOVE this new one, it's so pretty, the texture is different annnnddd it's DISHWASHER SAFE!!!!! My old one was not and running it through the dishwasher a few times is what caused the rust. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TaraTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed in dishwasher bought from Rogozina Shop
customer_reviews.text: I never used it in a dishwasher before, tried it tonight and the coating melted. I bought many of these cups, only this one had the problem, interesting this was the only one sold by Rogozina Shop so it may be fake. Only buy direct from yeti.
customer_reviews.author: Jerryed

customer_reviews.title: Insane Insulation
customer_reviews.text: You can’t really go wrong with Yeti. The initial sticker shock fades when you realize the type of quality you’re getting. Also, great color and makes for a fantastic gift! This tumbler is great for cold and hot drinks - I’ve kept cold iced tea and iced coffee in here while in hot weather for hours without it affecting the temperature of the drink. The heat capacity is great, too. It’s just as hot from waking up at 6am to pour my coffee in as it is hours later. I can take a sip at 4pm and it’ll be just as hot as 6am. Crazy! I’ll be a customer for life if Yeti keeps this kind of quality up. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Mirela Merolli

customer_reviews.title: Works but expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, large covered tumbler. Keeps iced tea cold and some of the ice for hours. So for thermal retention it would be hard to beat. However the price is very high for what is no more than an insulated glass and it's so large that it can be tricky to hold and use if your hands are not man-sized hands. One downside, maybe an upside for someone else, the cover to the lid is magnetic and has detached every time the lid has been dropped. I'm not sure how leaky that would be if the whole thing was ever dropped full while the lid was on.
customer_reviews.author: D. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything cold for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my cup holder. I'm surprised at how well insulated it is. It doesn't keep stuff as cold as my hydroflask, but that has a screw on cap and this is not the same, but I wasn't expecting it to. Still, I'm very happy. The lid pushes down and could come off if you threw it around, but the seal is very tight and secure. It's not meant to be thrown in a bag - it's meant to be carried or sit in your cupholder and that it does quite well. I haven't had it leak.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: A++ for quality, performance and looks. C- for easy transport.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful finish, superior quality, works amazingly well. My only complaint is that this 30 oz size is bulky and hard to hold sometimes. Especially if your carrying other things out to your car. I purchased the extra handle (additional $10) but it doesn't really help. I have average sized women's hands and find I can only hold it from the bottom skinny part without the additional handle. It fits in the larger cup holder with the handle inside the second cup spot because it's so bulky. I'm using mine everyday and trying to get used to it. Thinking I really should've gone with the 20oz size.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Goes with me everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I love my Yeti tumbler - it literally goes with me everywhere. I use it to keep water cold and it helps the ice last for hours and doesn't 'sweat' leaving a mark where it was set down. I drink a lot throughout the day, and the larger 30oz size helps with less trips to the water fountain, in addition, it fits in standard cup holders in the car. A great benefit as my cheaper, plastic water bottles that are larger in size do not! I use the plastic straw accessory that is purchased separately from this - making it not necessarily "spill-proof", but keeps the water in besides what would leak from the straw.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love these cups!
customer_reviews.text: My kids were going through bottled water like crazy. I couldn't stand all the wasted plastic that had to be recycled, so I informed them I was buying them Yeti cups and would no longer be purchasing any bottled beverages for them. They fussed about the idea, but now admit they love the Yeti cups. My older son is home from college working in the summer. He fills the cup up with ice and water in the morning, and it stays cold all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Schultz

customer_reviews.title: So far this has exceeded my expectations. I make ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this has exceeded my expectations. I make coffee at 4am and put it in the Yeti. By the time I travel to work, workout and finally get to my coffee, it's three hours later. The coffee is still hot and I don't have to reheat it!
customer_reviews.author: CJ1234

customer_reviews.title: Get one for every member of the family
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd 30 Oz Yeti tumbler that I've purchased in 3 months. The first one my oldest son took over because he said he needed a glass for his room and he like the color. I ordered this one for my husband and when my 18 year old son saw it on the kitchen counter, he asked if he could have it. So, now I have to order a third one for my husband. These are wonderful cups - they have certainly reduced the amount of bottled water that we go through. Personally, I love picking up my Yeti cup and being able to have a cold drink at any time of the day.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beverages cold or hot
customer_reviews.text: I have tested this a few times, if you shake it your beverage will leak a little bit through the part you drink from even if it is closed but it is very minimal compared to what would spill if there were no cap on. I have used it to drink in a reclining position and it is very comfortable to drink from and so far no leaks below the part I drink from. This does a good job at keeping my beverages both very cold and hot. I will purchase another in the future if this one holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric_S

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold as described + leaks!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to have a 30oz mug of coffee plus hoping for a leak proof cup, searcher for another product! It leaks almost as if you did have a lid on... it spills even when you are driving. Mug is well made, but I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Drumond

customer_reviews.title: Best tumbler Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Great, great product. I bought a Tervis custom tumbler and it in no way compares to this. The Tervis is NOT dishwasher safe, and does not keep things cold nearly as long. The only advantage is that it's a great deal thinner and lighter, so if you are weaker and/or don't care about keeping things cold long it might work for you (but it's also not a whole lot cheaper). I love all of these -- bought 4 of this size, and 4 of the 20oz (which are just as good). Only thing -- from now until the end of 2019 you can get these cheaper locally at your ACE hardware store. Just a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbler!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Yeti tumblers. they keep things hot or cold, as needed. They are pricey but they are first class, It asks to rate Leak Proof. It you have the magnetic slider closed and you knock it over and quickly pick it up it does not leak. But if it falls over and lays there it will start to dribble liquid out. I rarely remember to slide it close.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Burton

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I actually like the $14 RTIC version just as much, the only difference is the lid, so if you must have the magnet slider, which is not water tight and is a small part that would be easy to misplace or lose, I would opt for the RTIC. The RTIC spills less when closed, other than that they are interchangeable and I use them both regularly and like them both, but for the price, I wouldn't buy another yeti version if I were to lose mine. They do have cooler colors but I like the black RTIC just as much as this clay colored yeti.
customer_reviews.author: Oceanside Patrick

customer_reviews.title: I do LOVE yeti!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, the size and that it keeps everything cold for hours (I haven’t drank hot drinks from them). This is my 3rd YETI, but new to the 30oz. I think I will be purchasing a handle for it because it is so large. Upon arrival the lid was cracked so I threw it out (I have other lids), but condensation began to form. I think YETI and their products are all 5 star, but I’m thinking the package was really thrown around during transport because of the cracked lid and the condensation-the only reason for 3 stars. I also purchased a black one, that came in a separate shipment and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought this was just ok. I didn't think the ice was keeping long enough overnight to justify the cost. Turns out I was keeping the little drink spout open so the warm air could get in. Since then I've had ice in this cup in the car on a 93 degree Fahrenheit day and it kept the ice ALL DAY. I'm impressed. Highly recommend. Also, cleaning couldn't be easier, just throw it in the dishwasher! Most stainless steel tumblers are hand wash only. I feel like I won the Lottery here. I bought 2 of these in different colors one for me and one for my husband, so I"m reviewing both purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Eogeaux

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic lid is not spill proof, mind as well have bought a knock off-Wife disappointed. Wife not happy, I am not happy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Valentine's Day as a gift she would not buy herself, because these things are cheap. I was disappointed to find out that the cup leaks from the mouth spout. I thought it was spill proof. I knocked it over being funny to prove it, and got her coffee all over the floor. I paid extra for the magnetic close lid and went authentic purposely to have something that keeps hers coffee hot and she doesn't have to worry about leaking. I t seemed to keep the coffee warm and cool to the touch, but overall gotta say waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Love these cups!
customer_reviews.text: How can you not love these cups? They keep things cold (practically) forever! It keeps beverages hot too but not quite as long... And now, with the great colors, there's one for everyone! As far as engraving these, I'm sure the plain stainless steel ones can be engraved as I've seen it done. I'm not sure about the color coated cups. I tend to think why not but I'm not absolutely sure about it.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: I’m pleased!
customer_reviews.text: As others have expressed, I was worried about the authenticity of the item. However, I received a legitimate Yeti rambler with a valid registration code. It arrived with no cracks, scratches, or chips in the paint, metal, or plastic. Mine was sold by YETI Authorized (formerly Pronghorns Outfitters). Other sellers may be distributing fakes, so be aware.
customer_reviews.author: V. Balz

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Drink Cold Overnight!!
customer_reviews.text: I got a hydro flask before I got Yeti and now after testing it out I think I prefer the Yeti. They both are amazing products but the Yeti seems to keep it colder better. My boyfriend takes my Yeti all the time and I ended up buying him one. He works at the beach for 10+ hours a day and it keeps his drink cold all day at work! Also before bed I will put ice and water into my cup and wake up 7-8 hours later and it will still be cold. I love it and I recommend a Yeti to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jones

customer_reviews.title: THE YETI SHOULD COME WITH THE STAINLESS STRAWS & BRUSH FOR CLEANING.
customer_reviews.text: LOVING MY YETI. ITS WORTH THE MONEY EVERY SCENT. I’D BE HAPPIER IF THEY CAME WITH THE STAINLESS STRAWS INSTEAD OF HAVING TO PURCHASE SEPARATELY. YOU SPEND ENOUGH ON THE TUMBLER YOU WOULD THINK THE STRAWS CAME WITH THEM LIKE THE “BEAST” TUMBLER. AND THE BEAST ( I HAVE ALSO) DOES ALL THAT THE YETI DOES & COMES WITH 2 STRAWS & A BRUSH TO MAINTAIN THE CLEANLINESS OF YOUR TUMBLER. & IT’S 4.00 OR 5.00 CHEAPER.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Should Have Read The Reviews Closely
customer_reviews.text: I spent extra money to get this Yeti product. For the price paid I would expect that the mag lid would not leak. I've done everything I can and regardless of how tight I push it closed it leaks. While that isn't much of a problem for me because I don't intend for this to get tossed around much, for the price paid, I would expect the quality to be impeccable. The other beef I have with the lid is that it is difficcult to drink from the mag lid without liquid spilling around your lips. You have to drink carefully from this mug. As I write, debating whether to return this product. Caveat emptor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had a 30oz Yeti for a while and my husband was jealous. So I ordered him one as a gift and he loves it. We have both left iced coffee in the car all day this summer. When we get back into car, there is still ice in the Yetis! Yeti is just an exceptional brand. This red color is a medium tone and very attractive. While we have put Yetis in dishwasher sporadically, we handwash them most days due to the nonstop use. The cover stays sealed, is easy to remove and washes well. It came nicely boxed. I did not receive any discounts for my review.
customer_reviews.author: CTinCT

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing get one!
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost everyday I’m a truck driver and this keeps my tea or coffee hot for hours so I can enjoy it throughout the day. I also like that the closing piece on the lid is magnetic so I know when I closed it or opened it. If it fell on the floor you should pick it up within five seconds considering it’s not fully leak proof the part where it leaks a tiny bit is near the magnetic opener part to drink from but there is a nice seal from the clear plastic lid as well that nothing leaks from
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Excellent overall.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Large size satisfies my coffee addiction. Keeps coffee hot for hours. Magnetic lid is excellent and easy to clean. Spill resistant? Absolutely. Spill proof? Not a chance. But, for normal user it will handle normal shaking without spilling just fine, but if you flip it upside down it will drip. Have three of these, all are the same. Not really complaining as I don't make a habit of carrying it upside down but if you plan on throwing it in a bag and expecting it to be leak proof look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Efficient container!
customer_reviews.text: The yeti is a superior product. It is very well made and sturdy. The container keeps cold drinks cold for at least 12 hours and longer. Easy to clean and nicely balanced for such a large container. The 30 oz model is quite large, and may be too large for some people’s taste, but the quality is unsurpassed, and it is available in a smaller size for people who may prefer it smaller. The only “drawback” is that ice melts so slowly in the container, it is difficult to fill it with enough liquid and has to be refilled occasionally if one drinks quantities of liquids from it.
customer_reviews.author: mike-w

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I nearly always have a cold beverage in this cup. I don't need to put it in the refrigerator to keep it cold. I'll pick it up much later in the day and it is still cold. I bought an inexpensive carrier with a shoulder strap for when I go walking and want to carry it with me. It is not super comfortable to carry on a 2 hour walk in my smallish hands. The 30 oz size is great so it can last me a long time at work. I like the "MagSlider lid". The black piece is held on by a strong magnet that holds it in the open or closed position.
customer_reviews.author: huladiver04

customer_reviews.title: A big mug to keep your drinks hot or cold.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using on these mugs for a while and I fell in love with it. So, I bought another one and now when one mug is being washed I can us my other mug. They both keep my drinks cold for hours and my hot drinks hot for hours as well. I find that these mugs have become my go to mug for any kind of drinks. I use them in my car and around the house. Drop one, no worries pick it up and use it some more. No dings or dents from the time I have accidentally dropped one.
customer_reviews.author: Terry McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: No question, this is a well made, quality tumbler, but I found it odd that other colors were nearly triple the price, even on Yeti's site. I bought the less expensive one. I suspect it's not quite up to Yeti's normal quality and reputation, and that's why it was less. It works very well, however.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen S

customer_reviews.title: Was great until it started leaking around the seal as I drink thru the lid!
customer_reviews.text: The gasket around the lid is not working any longer after only 6 or 7 months. As I drink water dribbles through the gasket and onto me like some sort of gag mug. I try turning the lid, taking it off, putting it back on after drying the gasket - nothing keeps the leaks from restarting. Really sad! ESPECIALLY after wasting nearly $40 on this thing!!! UPDATE: contacted seller who immediately sent me a new lid! Great product, great support!!
customer_reviews.author: Karl B.

customer_reviews.title: The mag slide cap isn’t spill proof the cap is ...
customer_reviews.text: The mag slide cap isn’t spill proof the cap is leaking do y’all send a replacement cap or something ??
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love the cup, it's a pretty blue color. But it's expensive, and my ice did actually melt a few times in a matter of hours, while just sitting in my house. Maybe that's just physics which is fine. I also purchased the straw/lid and I will say those lids are super durable and leak proof. I bought a handle for it from the BEAST line because online reviews said the Yeti handle didn't work right - too close to the top of the cup, or slipped off constantly. I would recommend this cup, especially for people who are into cool looking name-brand labels.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part
customer_reviews.text: My white Yeti 30 oz Rambler arrived without the magnetic slider on the lid. The plastic packaging that normally holds it on at the store was missing, so it was maybe a returned item or something. Whatever the case, it was incomplete. The part costs $8 to replace, so it was an extremely frustrating purchase. I already had one of these Ramblers with the old-style lid, and have been happy with it. This transaction was less than satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: J. Conradt

customer_reviews.title: does not maintain heat or cold
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with the cup. I have heard how great they are staying cold or hot for a long time. I tested it. I made hot tea and then put in microwave to bring to boil. Placed in cup put lid on and left on countertop from 8 am till 5 pm the tea was slightly warm. the next day I put ice in cup and did the same thing, by 5 most of it was melted. Very disappointed, I show horses and was hoping that it would stay cold in the summer heat from 10 am to 5 pm so sad
customer_reviews.author: Twig

customer_reviews.title: I love my Yeti and wanted to share the love with ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my Yeti and wanted to share the love with my husband for his birthday. Unfortunately, his cane damaged. The bottom is bent and it is wobbly when setting. Will have to look into getting it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: VetMomWife

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but.....
customer_reviews.text: Love yeti!! Really good for lots of drinks, etc. unfortunately it was missing the mag slider which I saw some reviews that it’s happened to them. I literally got it right when it came to my house and then contacted amazon. They are giving me a refund and sending it back so i can order it again and hopefully get it the correct way. Except they are charging my a $1 to send me return label by mail cuz I don’t have a printer. I don’t think I should be charged that fee when it’s there fault but eh it’s only a dollar but just the point. Haha. Otherwise be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best gift to myself all year.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a few months for a tumbler this size that fits into a standard cup holder. This also does a fantastic job of keeping my coffee hot hours after i have poured the cup and walked away distracted by work. Looking forward to seeing how this keeps drinks cold in the summer when I am at kids baseball games.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Yetis are Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the cheaper versions of this tumbler and they do work quite nicely...but nothing compares to the might that is Yeti. I love that it's pretty much got Rhino Liner so it has a good grip. I bought this one as a gift for my boyfriend and it was funny how impressed he was with the heat retention. He said he felt like his coffee got warmer as it was in the cup. Arrived on time. I did buy the optional handle for it though which helps some when multi tasking/carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Jane of all Trades

customer_reviews.title: YETI CUP RUSTED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our YETI rusted!! We contacted yeti in regards to this situation and they were not helpful at all. They pretty much told us to clean it. We clean our cups everyday and we tried solutions to get rid of rust spots. This is very disappointing considering we have multiple yeti cups. I’ve never had a yeti rust on me before and this is extremely disappointing... especially since yeti is not willing to do anything to help or replace the item.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Lack luster 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this is authentic or what but it's not amazing. Yes it keeps my drinks cold but my Aldi's brand adventureridge straight cup keeps ice longer. Same with my rtic cup. I have a yeti coffee cup that I adore but this one just doesn't seem as good. I froze a few inches of water in the bottom, I only had ice for about 5 hours. It's also very heavy. Uncomfortably heavy for daily use. I definitely don't prefer it to cheaper brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth PipesTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Certain lid types will leak and not maintain your ice in your drink.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this cup did leak when on its side. It never made it through even half a day with ice still in your drink. They did honor the return process. I ended up getting their bottle that has a screw on lid which does still have ice in the drink at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Janet K

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Ice Overnight, Great for Big Hands
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a Christmas gift, which replaced a similar tumbler I had (not the same brand). Somehow the lid on the old one cracked and began leaking. What I loved about that one, and about this new one that I can put ice water in it at night and it will still have ice in the morning. It's also stylish enough to take with me to the office or around town. I wouldn't commute by subway with it, though, since the top does not screw on. One caveat: I'm a 6'4" man with large hands. I could see the diameter being too large for some people.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hoskinson

customer_reviews.title: Yeti is the Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Yeti; two have been gifts and I purchased one. If you live in the desert where it gets 120 in the summer, Yeti is the only thing that works. True story. You have leave in the morning (it is at least 100 in the early morning) and at the end of the day, you will still have ice in the Yeti. I have 1 20-oz and 2-30 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold all day!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the coffee I take on my long commute, not really thinking of how large it is. Rather than risking such over-caffeination, I gave it to my cold-drink-loving spouse and purchase a smaller tumbler for myself (which I love!). He loads it up with ice and his beverage in the morning and it is still icy when he returns home in the evening. It fits very well in cup holders, the lid fits really well, and the entire cup/lid set is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Denise C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This product proved to be exceptional at maintaining temperatures of whatever liquid was placed in it - while presenting a neutral temperature of its body. I placed ice in a third of the tumbler and filled it with water. On a 100 plus degree day I went shopping and left the product in the hot car. Two hours later, the water was still ice-cold and its aluminum-like surface was cool to the touch. The only downside of this product would be the price - I cannot fathom what justifies its $30.00 cost.
customer_reviews.author: philo46

customer_reviews.title: NOT a good overnight cup.
customer_reviews.text: It leaks from the magnetic slider, Its top heavy (will fall over and leak if placed on carpet floor bedside), and if you sleep next to a light sleeper be prepared to wake them up just by grabbing the cup. Will be staying away from all Yeti products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Best tumbler ever
customer_reviews.text: Best tumbler ever! Compared to the cheap Walmart or other brands, this tumbler is solid and heavy..you can tell it’s built to last and made from quality parts, even though it’s made in China, it probably will last..I love the slid lid. Easy to use and does not leak like the others I had in the past...one downside to this mug is - it’s not cheap! Expect to pay $10-15 more compared to the other competitor brand.
customer_reviews.author: AH

product_meta.title: YETI Rambler 30 oz Tumbler, Stainless Steel, Vacuum Insulated with MagSlider Lid
feature_bullets: These Ramblers come standard with our YETI MagSlider Lid, the only drink lid that uses the power of magnets to keep your water, beer, or favorite drink on lock
Our Ramblers are BPA-free, dishwasher safe, and have a No Sweat Design to make sure your hands stay dry
DuraCoat is a durable coat of color that won't fade, peel, or crack through extended field use and also provide additional grip to the Rambler's exterior
We over-engineered these double-wall insulated tumblers with an 18/8 stainless steel body, which means your drink still keeps its temperature no matter how much of a beating this cup takes
The YETI 30 oz. Rambler Tumbler stands 7 5/8 in high and has a lip diameter of 4 in. All YETI Tumblers are sized to fit in standard sized cup holders

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
